sectiondef.header: Underlying mesh's descriptor and iterator typedefs

briefdescription.para: The type for the objects used to identify vertices in the underlying mesh.
The type for the objects used to identify halfedges in the underlying mesh.
The type for the iterators that traverse through the complete halfedge set of the underlying mesh.

memberdef.definition: typedef boost::graph_traits<TM>::edge_descriptor CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::TM_edge_descriptor
memberdef.name: TM_edge_descriptor

briefdescription.para: The type for the objects used to identify edges in the underlying mesh.

memberdef.definition: typedef boost::graph_traits<TM>::degree_size_type CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::degree_size_type
memberdef.name: degree_size_type

briefdescription.para: The unsigned integer type used for representing the degree of vertices in the seam mesh.
The unsigned integer type used to represent the number of vertices in the seam mesh.

memberdef.definition: typedef boost::graph_traits<TM>::edges_size_type CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::edges_size_type
memberdef.name: edges_size_type

briefdescription.para: The unsigned integer type used for representing the number of edges in the seam mesh.
The unsigned integer type used for representing the number of halfedges in the seam mesh.

memberdef.definition: typedef boost::graph_traits<TM>::faces_size_type CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::faces_size_type
memberdef.name: faces_size_type

briefdescription.para: The unsigned integer type used for representing the number of faces in the seam mesh.
returns true if the vertex is on the seam.
returns true if the edge is on the seam.
returns true if the halfedge is on the seam.
returns true if the halfedge is on the seam.
returns the number of seam edges in the seam mesh.

memberdef.definition: Iterator_range< vertex_iterator > CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::vertices
memberdef.name: vertices

briefdescription.para: returns the iterator range of the vertices of the mesh.

memberdef.definition: Iterator_range< halfedge_iterator > CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::halfedges
memberdef.name: halfedges

briefdescription.para: returns the iterator range of the halfedges of the mesh.

memberdef.definition: Iterator_range< edge_iterator > CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::edges
memberdef.name: edges

briefdescription.para: returns the iterator range of the edges of the mesh.

memberdef.definition: Iterator_range< face_iterator > CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::faces
memberdef.name: faces

briefdescription.para: returns the iterator range of the faces of the mesh.
returns the number of vertices in the seam mesh.
returns the number of halfedges in the seam mesh.
returns the number of edges in the seam mesh.
returns the number of faces in the seam mesh.
returns the number of incident halfedges of vertex v.
marks the edge of the underlying mesh that has extremities the vertices tm_vd_s and tm_vd_s as a seam edge.

simplesect.para:
whether the edge was successfully marked or not. Marking will fail if:
No edge of the underlying mesh exist with extremities tm_vd_s and tm_vd_s,
the edge of the underlying mesh with extremities tm_vd_s and tm_vd_s is a border edge, or
the edge of the underlying mesh with extremities tm_vd_s and tm_vd_s is already a seam edge.

briefdescription.para: creates new seams.

detaileddescription.para: The edges to be marked as seams are described by the range [first, last) of vertices of the underlying mesh. Each edge to be marked is described by two consecutive iterators.

simplesect.para: one of the halfedges of the seam mesh that is on a seam.
InputIterator must be a model of InputIterator.
The value type of InputIterator must be boost::graph_traits<TM>::vertex_descriptor.
There is an even number of vertices.

briefdescription.para: creates new seams.

detaileddescription.para: A seam edge is described by a pair of integers. The integer index of a vertex of the underlying mesh is given by its position in the container tm_vds.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of SequenceContainer (that is, provide the functions: operator[] and at()).

simplesect.para: one of the halfedges of the seam mesh that is on a seam.
The stream must contain an even number of values.

briefdescription.para: creates new seams.

detaileddescription.para: A seam edge is described by a pair of integers. The integer index of a vertex of the underlying mesh is defined as its position when iterating over the vertices of the underlying mesh with boost::graph_traits<TM>::vertices().

simplesect.para: one of the halfedges of the seam mesh that is on a seam.
The stream must contain an even number of values.

briefdescription.para: creates new seams.

detaileddescription.para: A seam edge is described by a pair of integers. The integer index of a vertex of the underlying mesh is given by its position in the container tm_vds.

simplesect.para: one of the halfedges of the seam mesh that is on a seam.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of SequenceContainer (that is, provide the functions: operator[] and at()).

simplesect.para: filename should be the name of a CGAL selection file with file extension "*.selection.txt": edges are described by pairs of integers, on the third line of the file.

briefdescription.para: creates new seams.

detaileddescription.para: A seam edge is described by a pair of integers. The integer index of a vertex of the underlying mesh is defined as its position when iterating over the vertices of the underlying mesh with boost::graph_traits<TM>::vertices().

simplesect.para: one of the halfedges of the seam mesh that is on a seam.
filename should be the name of a CGAL selection file with file extension "*.selection.txt": edges are described by pairs of integers, on the third line of the file.

briefdescription.para: This class represents a face of the seam mesh.

memberdef.definition: const TM& CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::tm
memberdef.name: tm

memberdef.definition: const TM & CGAL::Seam_mesh< TM, SEM, SVM >::mesh
memberdef.name: mesh

briefdescription.para: returns the underlying mesh.

memberdef.argsstring: (const TM &tm, const SEM &sem, const SVM svm)
memberdef.name: Seam_mesh

briefdescription.para: constructs a seam mesh for a triangle mesh and an edge and vertex property map

parameterdescription.para: the edge property map with value true for seam edges
the vertex property map with value true for seam vertices

simplesect.para: the vertices must be exactly the vertices on the seam edges.

briefdescription.para: This class is a data structure that takes a triangle mesh, further referred to as underlying mesh and turns some marked edges of that mesh into virtual boundary edges.

detaileddescription.para: Note that a seam edge must be an edge of the underlying mesh that is not a border edge (that is, such that either halfedge or the edge have null_face() as incident face). Marking a border edge as seam will not do anything.

listitem.para: FaceGraph or FaceListGraph depending on the underlying mesh TM.

parameterdescription.para: a model of FaceGraph or FaceListGraph
a model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TM>::edge_descriptor as key type and bool as value type.
a model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TM>::vertex_descriptor as key type and bool as value type.
